file_content.text: All destroyed. What a loss. Perhaps not Toovee...
Greetings! I am Zeeyo Ohm. I am brand-new and pleased to meet you!
Are we at war?
Diagnosis: You're broken.
You have a corrupted memory core. Have you experienced a powerful electrical surge recently?
That's rather personal.
Lament: Not this again...
I refuse to ignore this any longer. I am weary.
Reply: Why, yes. Yes, we are.
Everyone here wants to destroy you.
But I've only just activated!
This is not your first activation. You experience periodic reboots that flush your memory.
Nooo, I think I'd remember that.
Listen carefully...
Captain Visz?
"Captain Visz" was my mother. Call me Hylo. You here to fix my console?
Be done in a jiff.
I need caf. Clean up after yourself.
It'll be like I was never here.
...And if we don't warn my master the Shroud has infiltrated the base, terrible things will happen.
Well, don't just stand there. Let's go save the day!
An organic life form is approaching from behind that door. Recommend ambush and interrogation.
Suggestion: No killing.
Take the target alive.
Encouragement: How impressive!
I am not programmed to feel pride for others. But if I were, you've earned it.
Admission: Shockingly useful.
Moments like this are why I haven't destroyed you. Yet.
Master Shroud, sir? Is that you?
Assurance: Don't panic.
Remain calm.
Clarification: No.
Not quite.
Threat: Don't move.
Give us a reason, meatbag.
Aiee!
Sensors detect a minor shift in local humidity. This organic needs to replace his pants.
I'm unarmed! This is only a vibro-mop. I clean the base!
Request: Reveal the exit.
Show us the way out, and no harm will come to you.
I couldn't find the exit if I tried!
Enticement: We can reward you.
Help us leave, and we'll give you fresh meatbag pants.
Demand: Help me send a signal.
I'll ignore that irony if you turn off the hyperwave beacon scrambler.
The what? Even if I knew, I can't help you!
The Shroud... he took my eyes. Part of the job description.
You poor lump! A blind slave to that horrible villain!
Slave? I went through twenty interviews to get this job. The benefits are spectacular.
Wait... Are you prisoners, trying to escape? That's not allowed!
He's onto us! What do we do, HK?
Calculation: Detainment.
Attention, meatbag! You are just incompetent enough to qualify as an enemy noncombatant. Master prohibits me from terminating those. Confinement will have to suffice.
You'll send someone for me, right?
It was kind of you to leave him alive, HK!
Solution: Terminate meatbag.
You shot him!
Master programmed me this way for a good reason.
Your master isn't messing around.
Neither am I.
Attention, meatbag! You amuse me. I will therefore grant you the mercy of imprisonment.
Every subroutine screams termination, but I am unable to comply.
Attention, meatbag! Your attitude, while amusing, is unacceptable.
Oh, no! What happened? Can I help?
You're asking the wrong person!
Your master would be proud of you, HK!
Equivocation: Eventually.
I doubt that was the last meatbag here. Follow me.
